actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing for the reconfirmation by popular vote of certain Federal judges.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the reconfirmation by popular vote of Federal district court judges at the time of every fourth Congressional election after such judge's appointment.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States providing for the reconfirmation by popular vote of certain Federal judges.
